job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongPOSITION PURPOSEbrbrstrongThe Software Engineer is responsible for joining an Application Operations team and contributing to the support of overall product lifecycle and standardizing processes for increased efficiency in our Supply Chain Applications This position focuses on handling incident management problem management change management ad hoc requests and knowledge base creationbrbrAs a Software Engineer you will be part of a team with more experienced engineers to help build and grow your skills while you support and improve the efficiency and reliability of the applications you supportbrbrstronguMajor Tasks Responsibilities And Key Accountabilitiesbrbrustrongstrong60  Delivery amp ExecutionbrbrstrongCollaborates and pairs with other product team members UX engineering and product management to create secure reliable scalable software solutionsbrbrWorks with Product Team to ensure user stories that are developerready easy to understand and testablebrbrWrites custom code or scripts to automate infrastructure monitoring services and test casesbrbrWrites custom code or scripts to do destructive testing to ensure adequate resiliency in productionbrbrConfigures commercial off the shelf solutions to align with evolving business needsbrbrCreates meaningful dashboards logging alerting and responses to ensure that issues are captured and addressed proactivelybrbrstrong20  Support amp EnablementbrbrstrongFields questions from other product teams or support teamsbrbrMonitors tools and participates in conversations to encourage collaboration across product teamsbrbrProvides application support for software running in productionbrbrProactively monitors production Service Level Objectives for productsbrbrProactively reviews the Performance and Capacity of all aspects of production code infrastructure data and message processingbrbrstrong20 LearningbrbrstrongParticipates in learning activities around modern software design and development core practices communities of practicebrbrProactively views articles tutorials and videos to learn about new technologies and best practices being used within other technology organizationsbrbrReviews and discusses code from more senior engineers to understand best practices and design patternsbrbrIncreases business acumen by learning about other parts of the businessbrbrstrongNATURE AND SCOPEbrbrstrongTypically reports to the Software Engineer Manager or Sr ManagerbrbrstronguEnvironmentbrbrustrongLocated in a comfortable indoor area Any unpleasant conditions would be infrequent and not objectionablebrbrstronguTravelbrbrustrongTypically requires overnight travel less than 10 of the timebrbrstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongMust be eighteen years of age or olderbrbrMust be legally permitted to work in the United StatesbrbrstronguAdditional Minimum QualificationsbrbrustrongExperience in an object oriented programming language preferably JavabrbrstronguEducation RequiredbrbrustrongThe knowledge skills and abilities typically acquired through the completion of a high school diploma andor GEDbrbrstrongYears of Relevant Work Experience strong1 yearbrbrstronguPhysical RequirementsbrbrustrongMost of the time is spent sitting in a comfortable position and there is frequent opportunity to move about On rare occasions there may be a need to move or lift light articlesbrbrstronguPreferred Qualificationsbrustrongulli01 years of relevant work experienceliliExperience in a modern scripting language preferably PythonliliExposure to a modern web application framework such as Ruby on Rails Spring MVC and NodejsliliExposure to a frontend technology and framework such as HTML CSS JavaScript AngularJS ReactJS and JQueryliliExposure to writing SQL queries against a relational databaseliliExposure to version control systems preferably GitbrliulstrongKnowledge Skills Abilities and CompetenciesstrongCultivates Innovation Creating new and better ways for the organization to be successfulbrulliCollaborates Building partnerships and working collaboratively with others to meet shared objectivesliliCommunicates Effectively Developing and delivering multimode communications that convey a clear understanding of the unique needs of different audiencesliliDrives Results Consistently achieving results even under tough circumstancesliliGlobal Perspective Taking a broad view when approaching issues using a global lensliliInterpersonal Savvy Relating openly and comfortably with diverse groups of peopleliliManages Ambiguity Operating effectively even when things are not certain or the way forward is not clearliliNimble Learning Actively learning through experimentation when tackling new problems using both successes and failures as learning fodderliliSelfDevelopment Actively seeking new ways to grow and be challenged using both formal and informal development channelsliliSituational Adaptability Adapting approach and demeanor in real time to match the shifting demands of different situationsliul
